name: TC-20-P :: Filter Product List using Faceted Search

actions.action: Navigate to a main category page e.g. "Clothes".

actions.expectedResult: The page reloads to show products in the "Men" sub-category.

actions.action: Check the "In stock" checkbox under the "Availability" filter.
actions.expectedResult: The page reloads showing only in-stock products.

actions.action: Check the "Discounted" checkbox under the "Selections" filter.
actions.expectedResult: The page reloads showing only discounted products.

actions.action: Check the "M" checkbox under the "Size" filter.
actions.expectedResult: The page reloads showing only products available in size M.

actions.action: Verify the product count text at the top of the results.
actions.expectedResult: A product count summary such as "There is 1 product." is visible.
